address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=BIGINT},

spend_tx_hash = #{spendTxHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tx_hash = #{txHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tx_index = #{txIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}
